problem.markdown:
1. System reliability in case of DCS is (x) High () Moderate () Less
2) DCS has a ------------ structure. () Simple () Planer (x) Hierarchical
3) On which level does the field instruments are in the architecture of DCS? (x) Level 0 () Level 2 () Level 4
4) Limit function is available under ----- library in DCS. () Logical (x) Analog control () Timer/ counter
5) If any one of the two inputs goes high the output is high. To achieve this condition the function block to be used is ---------. () NOT () AND (x) OR
